General.Name: Leadtek Research Inc
General.Description: Leadtek Research Inc. develops, manufactures, and sells graphics cards worldwide. The company offers virtual desktop systems, including zero and thin client series products, management consoles, and remote workstation cards; graphics cards; professional graphics; AI and performance computing, including development kits, virtualization, AI deep learning systems, and data center accelerator; AI interface devices; GPU docker management systems and RTX AI software packs; and workstations and servers, as well as amor and pulse oximeters. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 166, Jian 1st Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 23511
